dt: {bc}a brick or building material of sun-dried earth and straw
{bc}a heavy clay used in making adobe bricks
{bc}alluvial or playa clay in desert or arid regions

et: borrowed from Spanish, borrowed from Arabic {it}aṭ-ṭūb,{/it} from {it}al{/it} "the" + {it}ṭūb{/it} "brick (material), bricks," borrowed from Coptic (Sahidic dialect) {it}tôôbe,{/it} (Bohairic dialect) {it}tôbi{/it} "brick," going back to Old Egyptian {it}db.t{/it}
shortdef: a brick or building material of sun-dried earth and straw
a structure made of adobe bricks
a heavy clay used in making adobe bricks; broadly : alluvial or playa clay in desert or arid regions
